Class DumbAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.ai.AI
      • gameplay.ai.DumbAI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandIssuer, java.io.Serializable

    public class DumbAI
extends AI
    AI which implements the logic for the Low intelligence AI as specified by "Low intelligence enemies will move in one direction until they hit an obstacle then they will move in the opposite direction"
